titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: WOMEN INVITED FOR ROUTINE SCREENING WITH TECHNICALLY ADEQUATE RESULT (PERCENTAGE OF INVITED) - Description

div.p: WOMEN INVITED FOR ROUTINE SCREENING WITH TECHNICALLY ADEQUATE RESULT (PERCENTAGE OF INVITED) is the uptake rate (also known as the acceptance rate) for Breast Screening.

WOMEN INVITED FOR ROUTINE SCREENING WITH TECHNICALLY ADEQUATE RESULT (PERCENTAGE OF INVITED) is defined as the percentage of women who attended for Breast Screening and whose BREAST SCREENING MAMMOGRAPHY OUTCOME CODE was not recorded as National Code 'Inadequate test' as a result of an invitation for routine screening.
